mapper.select: select pop_up_id, COALESCE(update_at,create_at) as creat_At from tb_popup_main where 1=1 and NOW() between to_date(pop_start,'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(pop_end,'yyyy-MM-dd')+interval '23 hours 59minute 59second' order by create_At desc
select pop_up_id ,title ,content ,create_at ,update_at ,writer_id ,pop_start ,pop_end from tb_popup_main where 1=1 and pop_up_id = #{popUpId}
mapper.update: update tb_popup_main set title='${title}', content='${content}', pop_start='${popStart}', pop_end='${popEnd}', update_at=NOW() where pop_up_id = #{popUpId}
